Members

protected

  • $apiUrl
    API credential information required to execute requests
  • $authId
  • $authPassword
  • $authType
  • $sslCheck
    Verify SSL connection

public

  • $Response
    storage for API responses

Methods

public

  • addRecord() — Add new record to domain zone.
  • changeRecordStatus() — Changes the status of the record to active or inactive
  • copyRecords() — Copies all the records from a specified zone.
  • deleteRecord() — Delete record of your domain zone.
  • exportRecords() — Export the zone records in bind format.
  • getAvailableRecordTypes() — Get the available record types you can set up.
  • getAvailableTTLs() — Get the available TTL you can set up for the DNS records.
  • getSOADetails() — Getting SOA details.
  • importRecords() — Import records, defined in parameter.
  • importViaTransfer() — Imports records from another server via zone transfer. Deletes all existing records
  • listRecords() — List of records in the domain zone
  • modifyRecord() — Modify record in domain zone.
  • modifySOADetails() — Modify SOA details.

Inherited from tvorwachs\ClouDNS\Connection

protected

  • connect() — Runs the final connection with all the data needed
  • getAuth() — Returns the GET array to be used for authentication
  • getDomain()
  • login() — Test login details
  • url_encode() — This section takes the input fields and converts them to the proper format for an http post. For example: "auth_id=username&auth_password=a1B2c3D4"

public

  • setOptions() — Pass in options to set as an array
